UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Thrombin-Derived Peptides Potentiate the Activity of Gram-Positive-Specific Antibiotics against Gram-Negative Bacteria.
Literature.Author: Wesseling CMJ, Wood TM, Bertheussen K, Lok S, Martin NI

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli BW25113(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=200µg/ml),Escherichia coli W3110(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Escherichia coli mcr(MIC=100µg/ml),Escherichia coli EQASmcr-1(MIC=100µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(MIC=50µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=100µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=50µg/ml)
